attributes.action: Introduce a limited ‘right to keep and bear arms’ for the purpose of self-defence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce a limited ‘right to keep and bear arms’ for the purpose of self-defense.  The legal right to own a hand gun, which adopts any system to make it difficult for the gun to be discharged by any other party but the legal owner.  Gun owners must be licenced and the sale and resale of guns carried out my authorised persons only.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
